summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hand Crafted Ceramic Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser,100ml Fragrant Room Sprays Ultrasonic Aroma Mist Atomizer BPA-Free, Waterless Auto Shut-Off and 7 Color Night Lights for Office Home Study Yoga
Review Date: 2019/07/22
Store: BRNBW
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRNBW', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Special Feature': 'Multiple Light Setting, Automatic Shut Off', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 6.3 inches; 1.12 Pounds', 'UPC': '665059186312'}
Review Text: This diffuser works well, my room smelled great. The kids enjoyed the soft color scheme as the diffuser was on. The ceramic looks very nice and it blends well with the decor when not in use.
Review Title: The glowing lights are great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 4 pcs Button Headband Yoga Sports Workout Turban Headwrap Elastic Ear Protection Holder Twisted Running Hair Band for Women Men Adult Kids (Style A)
Review Date: 2020/09/13
Store: FMJYa
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Material': 'Polyester', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic,Polyester,Spandex', 'Item Weight': '80 Grams', 'Brand': 'FMJYa', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Product Dimensions': '10.63 x 9.45 x 0.59 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '602310562591'}
Review Text: The buttons are not sturdily sewed right the headband. I have others with large buttons that support my large banded masks, these did not. The button flopped forward and the mask slipped off. It worked much better with the thin banded masks.
Review Title: Good fit, big buttons
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2Pcs silicon body scrubbers, Bath Exfoliating Silicone Body Back Scrubber, Body Wash Silicone Body Scrubber
Review Date: 2020/12/01
Store: Cricoli
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 7.32 x 2.36 inches; 15.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931953692'}
Review Text: I was interested to try something new, but these did not work as well as the style I’d used previously. They are definitely more durable, but since I end up skipping them altogether, it’s not a saver for us.
Review Title: Did not like as much as I hoped to
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 5 PCS Big Hair Claw Clips Trendcy Colors- 4.3 Inch Matte Non-slip Material Strong Hold Hair For Women And Girls, 9 PCS Hair Ties- 3 Popular Colors Coil Hair Ties, Phone Cord Hair Ties, Hair Coils,Fashion Hair Accessories

Store: Aceoce
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aceoce', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Claw', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.76 x 4.76 x 3.74 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '728872436672'}
Review Text: These claw clips worked okay with my thick hair, but not great. The hair ties were too small.
Review Title: Claw Clips Okay for Thick Hair
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: NODG 6 Pieces Scrunchies for Hair Cute Scrunchies for Women with Pearl Women's Hair Scrunchies Chiffon Flowers Elastic Hair Bands Scrunchy Hair Ties Ropes Scrunchy Hair Scrunchies

Average Rating: 4.8

Review Text: These scrunchies have adorable prints. I love them and so does my daughter.
Review Title: Cute prints

Average Rating: 4.3

Review Title: Neon
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LordHighting 240 Pieces Halloween Party/ Ball Press on False Nails with Design, 12 Sizes Medium and Long Full Cover Gloss Fake Nails for Woman and Girls
Review Date: 2021/10/30
Store: LordHighting
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'LordHighting', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '7.68 x 3.35 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces'}
Review Text: The sizes were a bit difficult to figure out, but it was cute and easy to use. need your own glue, does not include glue as some sets do.
Review Title: Fun Halloween Nails
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 100% PURE Cocoa Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliating Deep Cleanse with Sea Salts & Nourishing Oils Natural Moisturizing Skincare Radiant Skin Restore & Pore Cleanser for Women & Men Vegan - 10oz
Review Date: 2022/03/23
Store: 100% PURE
Product Description: ['Our invigorating cacao and coffee body scrub buffs away bumps and flakes for radiant, deeply nourished skin. We source the highest quality organic and fair trade Ecuadorian cacao, which contains beneficial tannins, flavonoids, and antioxidants. Natural caffeine from coffee and cacao offers calming benefits to reduce redness, combat the effects of UV damage in skin, and promote a glowing complexion.']
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': '100% PURE', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourished', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Gluten Free, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.58 x 1.93 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1BCCBS', 'Department': 'mens', 'UPC': '843585108033', 'Manufacturer': '100% PURE'}
Review Text: The other items in this line I liked a lot. This was unpleasant feeling and snaked more like first than coffee.
Review Title: Not a fan
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has enjoyed several products, particularly appreciating their functionality and aesthetic appeal. The aromatherapy diffuser received high praise for its performance and attractive design, enhancing the ambiance with pleasant scents and soothing lights. The hair scrunchies were noted for their adorable prints, loved by both the user and their child, adding a delightful touch to hair accessories. Bright and bold nail polish colors delighted the user’s daughters, garnering positive attention and compliments. Overall, the positive experiences highlight effective products that successfully enhance their intended use.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Some products in the user's purchase history brought disappointment due to usability issues and quality concerns. The headband was criticized for poorly attached buttons that caused functionality problems, making it less effective with certain masks. The silicone body scrubbers did not meet expectations, as the user preferred a different style that was more effective for their needs. Lastly, the body scrub's texture was unpleasant, as it did not feel as expected, leading to dissatisfaction. These negative aspects indicate a struggle with particular product designs and performance.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experiences reveal a mix of joy and frustration. Positive highlights include well-functioning products that enhance atmosphere and style, such as the diffuser, scrunchies, and nail polish. However, there were notable disappointments, especially regarding the practicality of certain accessories and a lackluster body scrub. While many purchases were satisfying, some fell short, suggesting room for improvement in quality and design. This blend of highs and lows demonstrates the user's diverse shopping experiences across different product categories.

target_interaction.title: Exfoliating
target_interaction.text: I love how his product smells and the exfoliating was great. Highly recommended!
target_interaction.title_meta: 100% PURE Coconut Body Scrub Exfoliating Deep Cleanse with Sea Salts & Nourishing Oils - Natural Deeply Moisturizing Skincare - Vibrant Radiant Skin Restore & Pore Cleanser - Vegan - 10oz
features: BUFF OUT THE ROUGH SPOTS - Skin-quenching bath and shower rub scrubs away flakes, bumps, and dry patches everywhere from hand, foot to bum revealing a radiant, deeply nourished bod.

RESTORE THAT YOUTHFUL GLOW - Detoxifying crystals gently exfoliate with fatty acids and vitamin E to help protect skin from free radical damage and jojoba to soothe dryness and chafing for smooth, comfortable, super soft skin.

MIND-BENDING DETOXIFICATION - Your skin deals with a lot day to day causing it to lose its luster; let sea salt and coconut transport your skin and senses to a tropical island of full-body rejuvenation where softer, healthier-looking skin lives.

GIVE YOUR SKIN SOME LOVE - Stimulate and remove the buildup of dead skin cells, and prep skin to better absorb moisture from creams and lotions with a non-greasy moisturizing plant-based and antioxidant blend.

BEAUTY DOESN'T GET ANY CLEANER - You don't have to choose health or beauty, have both. With well-researched healthy, natural, and organic ingredients and strict purity standards, we bring cruelty-free products from ethically sourced ingredients without harsh toxic chemicals, heavy metals, or dyes. Gluten-free, vegan, and Made in the USA.
description: Crystalline sea salt scrub smoothes while softening skin with rich, supple moisture. Suspended in a base of silky sunflower and apricot oils, this emollient sea salt scrub buffs away bumps and flakes to reveal glowing, rejuvenated skin.
